name: Speed Fighter IV
description:
Speed Fighter IV is a small fighting game where 2 players can fight each other with special conditions: the speed will change through the fight.

This our first Unity 2D video game made for a study project.

Player 1:

ZQSD = move

g = attack

Player 2:

Arrow keys = move

keypad(4) = attack

New features will come :

-protection

-heavy attack

-super attack
